title: I Became a Vampire Princess after Reincarnation!? Building The Strongest Yuri Harem Using the Cheat Skill 【Demon King】! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Yuri
tags: Adventurers   Amnesia   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Blood Manipulation   Cheats   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Demons   Evolution   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Humanoid Protagonist   Inheritance   Level System   Magic   Male to Female   Master-Servant Relationship   Monster Girls   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Special Abilities   Succubus   Sword And Magic   Transformation Ability   Transported to Another World   Vampires   Weak to Strong

description:
When I woke up, I found myself turned into a delicate looking girl on a water surface.

I was reincarnated into this world suddenly with no memory intact and as a beautiful vampire girl at that. No, wasn't I supposed to have been a man before!?

Watch my abilities grow as I try to evolve into the strongest by raising levels like in a game.

Adding to that is the power of the cheat skill 【Demon Lord】that I’ve inherited improves, strengthens, and accelerates a lot of things, and also allows me to grow my subordinates according to what I’ve desired.

It’s a fantasy world that includes a system of subordinating and the cultivating of monsters.>
